content: तम् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (ताम्यति, तांत) {@--1@} To choke, be suffocated. {@--2@} To be exhausted or fatigued; ललितशिरीषपुष्पहननैरपि ताम्यति यत् <ls>Māl. 5. 31.</ls> {@--3@} To be distressed (in body or mind), be uneasy or pained, pine, waste away; प्रविशति मुहुः कुंजं गुंजन्मुहुर्बहु ताम्यति <ls>Gīt. 5</ls>; गाढोत्कंठा ललितलुलितैरंगकैस्ताम्यतीति <ls>Māl. 1. 15</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">9. 33</ls>; तृष्णे मुधा ताम्यसि <ls>Mu. 3. 1</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 7.</ls> {@--4@} To stop, become immoveable. {@--5@} To wish, desire. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (तमयति) To suffocate, choke.
